title: Inflation rate in Malawi 2024
yAxis: Inflation rate compared to previous year
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Inflation rate compared to previous year. In total the number of data points it has is 41.
In general Inflation rate compared to previous year has fallen over the Year.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 1994 and 1995.
The highest Inflation rate compared to previous year, of value 83.15 was reached at Year 1995
Minimum Inflation rate compared to previous year about 5.05 was reached at Year 2024
min_summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Inflation rate compared to previous year, containing a total of 41 data points.

max_summary: The chart generally has many fluctuations.
The chart generally has many fluctuations.
The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Inflation rate compared to previous year. In total the number of data points it has is 41.
Overall Inflation rate compared to previous year has decreased over the Year.
The chart generally has many fluctuations.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 1994 and 1995.
The highest Inflation rate compared to previous year, of value 83.15 was reached at Year 1995
Minimum Inflation rate compared to previous year about 5.05 was reached at Year 2024

The line rapidly increased by 76.66% from Year 1986 to 1987,increased by 182.38% from Year 1991 to 1992,increased by 139.9% from Year 1994 to 1995,decreased by 75.78% from Year 1996 to 1997,increased by 225.82% from Year 1997 to 1998,decreased by 74.19% from Year 2000 to 2001, and lastly, increased by 179.53% from Year 2011 to 2012.
